DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : CHINA
DOC.TEXT: $ 1.28-Billion Trade_Deficit Posted : The deficit for the first_quarter occurred even though the export growth_rate exceeded that of_imports for the first time in two years , a state-run newspaper reported.In the first three months of 1994 , China exported $ 19.11 billion worth of goods , up 18.7 % from the same period last year . It imported $ 20.39 billion , up 18.2 % , the China Daily said . China last year registered its first trade_deficit in four years , $ 12.8 billion , and experts have warned that another deficit is likely this year .
